item.title: 📍 How to find me
item.description: Email: {fistname}.{lastname}@imdea.org 💻 Mailing Address: 📬 IMDEA Software Institute Campus Montegancedo s/n 28223 Pozuelo de Alarcon, Madrid Spain

item.title: 🥸 Who?
item.description: Hi 👋🏻 I am Nicolas Manini, a Computer Science PhD Student at the IMDEA Software Institute and Universidad Politécnica de Madrid. I am part of Pierre Ganty’s group. 🧑🏻‍💻 In my research I focus on topics such as Automata Theory, Formal Verification and Abstract Interpretation. 🔙 Background 🎓 Master’s Degree in Computer Science at the University of Pisa (2021), Thesis: “Deciding Program Properties via Complete Abstractions on Bounded Domains”, supervised by R.

item.title: 🧑🏻‍💻 My Work
item.description: 📝 Papers: Computing Reachable Simulations P. Ganty, N. Manini, F. Ranzato. [arXiv] Deciding Program Properties via Complete Abstractions on Bounded Domains R. Bruni, R. Gori, N. Manini. SAS 2022. [PDF] 🖼️ Posters: Complete Abstraction on Bounded Domains My I[M]DEA Show Your Work Day 2023. [PDF] Online Simulation Reduction My I[M]DEA Show Your Work Day 2022. [PDF]
